snippet: The remains of thousands of American soldiers killed in the Korean War are being moved from their burial sites because of construction work, state news media said.
abstract: North Korea says remains of thousands of American soldiers killed in country during Korean War are in danger of getting lost after being moved from their burial sites due to various construction projects.
lead_paragraph: The remains of thousands of American soldiers killed in the Korean War are being moved from their burial sites because of construction work, state news media said.

headline.main: North Korea Says G.I.s’ Remains May Vanish
headline.print_headline: North Korea Says G.I.s’ Remains May Vanish
